00048 /*===========================================================================
00049  *
00050  *      File :          r_regquery.c
00051  *      Description :   Register allocation configuration queries
00052  *      Creation Date : Feb. 1994
00053  *      Author :        Richard Hank, Wen-mei Hwu
00054  *

00061 
00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 #include "r_regalloc.h"
00065 
00066 /*
00067  * Return the number of available register of type <type>, if
00068  * <caller_save> == 1, return num caller saved registers, else
00069  * return callee saved registers
00070  */
00071 int
00072 R_number_of_registers (int type, int caller_save, int macro)
00073 {
00074   R_Physical_Bank *caller, *callee, *macro_caller, *macro_callee;
00075   int registers = 0;
00076 
00077   int reg_type = R_Ltype_to_Rtype (type);
00078 
00079   if (caller_save)
00080     {
00081       caller = R_bank + reg_type + R_CALLER;
00082       if (caller->defined)
00083         registers += caller->num_reg;
00084     }
00085   else
00086     {
00087       callee = R_bank + reg_type + R_CALLEE;
00088       if (callee->defined)
00089         registers += callee->num_reg;
00090     }
00091 
00092   if (R_Macro_Allocation && macro)
00093     {
00094       if (caller_save)
00095         {
00096           macro_caller = R_bank + reg_type + R_MACRO_CALLER;
00097           if (macro_caller->defined)
00098             registers += macro_caller->num_reg;
00099         }
00100       else
00101         {
00102           macro_callee = R_bank + reg_type + R_MACRO_CALLEE;
00103           if (macro_callee->defined)
00104             registers += macro_callee->num_reg;
00105         }
00106     }
00107 
00108 
00109   return (registers);
00110 }
00111 
00112 int
00113 R_size_of_register (int type)
00114 {
00115   R_Physical_Bank *bank = R_bank + R_Ltype_to_Rtype (type);
00116 
00117   if (bank->defined)
00118     return (bank->reg_size * 32);
00119 
00120   return (0);
00121 }
00122 
00123 int
00124 R_register_overlap (int type1, int type2)
00125 {
00126   R_Physical_Bank *bank1, *bank2;
00127 
00128   bank1 = R_bank + R_Ltype_to_Rtype (type1) + R_CALLER;
00129   if (!bank1->defined)
00130     return (0);
00131 
00132   bank2 = R_bank + R_Ltype_to_Rtype (type2) + R_CALLER;
00133   if (!bank2->defined)
00134     return (0);
00135 
00136   return (bank1->overlap == bank2->overlap);
00137 }
